name: Smartphone x
description: Smartphone X with high-speed 5G and top-tier features.

name: Smartphone y
description: Smartphone Y with high-speed 4G and top-tier features.

name: Laptop pro 2
description: Computer A with powerful performance and stunning 4K display.

name: Gaming laptop Y
description: Gaming Laptop Y with ultimate speed, large storage, and ultra HD display.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
details: Up to 30 hours of battery life
description: Sony's WH-1000XM5 headphones offer industry-leading noise cancellation, high-quality audio, and long-lasting battery life.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse
description: The Logitech MX Master 3S is a precision wireless mouse with ultra-fast scrolling and ergonomic design for maximum comfort.

name: PlayStation 5
description: The PlayStation 5 offers immersive 4K gaming, lightning-fast load times, and revolutionary haptic feedback with the DualSense controller.

name: Xbox Series X
description: The Xbox Series X is Microsoft's most powerful console yet, offering 120 FPS gaming, 8K HDR support, and extensive backward compatibility.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: The Nintendo Switch OLED features a vibrant 7-inch OLED display, offering both handheld and docked modes for versatile gaming experiences.

name: Steam Deck
description: The Steam Deck is a handheld gaming console designed for PC gaming on the go, with a custom AMD APU and high-speed SSD storage.

name: Sonos One
details: Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant
description: The Sonos One is a smart speaker that delivers rich sound and voice control capabilities, making it perfect for any room.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+
details: Up to 17 Hours of Battery Life
description: The Bose SoundLink Revolve+ provides powerful 360-degree sound and is designed for portability and durability, perfect for outdoor use.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones offer exceptional noise cancellation, high-quality audio, and long-lasting battery life, making them ideal for travelers.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45
details: Up to 24 Hours of Battery Life
description: The Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones provide superior comfort and noise cancellation, making them perfect for long listening sessions.

name: Netgear Nighthawk AX12
description: The Netgear Nighthawk AX12 offers blazing-fast Wi-Fi 6 speeds, extensive coverage, and powerful performance for gaming and streaming.

name: ASUS RT-AX88U
description: The ASUS RT-AX88U is a powerful dual-band Wi-Fi 6 router designed for gamers and smart homes, providing ultra-fast speeds and low latency.

name: TP-Link TL-SG108
description: The TP-Link TL-SG108 is an 8-port gigabit switch that provides reliable, high-speed network connectivity for your home or office.

name: Ubiquiti UniFi Dream Machine
description: The Ubiquiti UniFi Dream Machine combines a high-performance router, security gateway, and managed switch, providing a complete network solution.

name: Apple Watch Series 8
description: The Apple Watch Series 8 features advanced health tracking, an always-on display, and powerful connectivity options, making it perfect for fitness enthusiasts.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5
description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 offers a sleek design with advanced health metrics, long battery life, and integration with Google services.

name: Garmin Venu 2
description: The Garmin Venu 2 is designed for fitness enthusiasts, offering detailed health and fitness tracking features in a vibrant AMOLED display.

name: Fitbit Sense
description: The Fitbit Sense is a health-focused smartwatch that offers advanced health metrics, stress management tools, and personalized insights.

name: LG C2 OLED TV
description: The LG C2 OLED TV offers stunning picture quality with deep blacks, vibrant colors, and advanced gaming features for an immersive experience.

name: Samsung QN90A Neo QLED TV
description: The Samsung QN90A combines Quantum Dot and Mini LED technologies for exceptional brightness and contrast, perfect for any viewing environment.

name: Sony A80J OLED TV
description: The Sony A80J OLED TV features advanced processing for stunning visuals and immersive sound, making it a great choice for movie lovers.

name: TCL 6-Series R635
description: The TCL 6-Series R635 offers a great combination of price and performance with its Mini LED technology and vibrant QLED display.
